questions.question: What is the predominant color of the packaging's background?
What is the overall shape of the product's packaging?
What appears to be the primary material of the product packaging?
What type of text is predominantly featured on the packaging?
Considering the size and detail, what is the packaging's likely function?
What secondary color accents the yellow background of the box?
Based on its appearance, what is the probable product type inside?
Does the packaging show any noticeable images or icons?
What is the texture of the packaging, considering its material?
Is the text on the box predominantly horizontally or vertically oriented?
What language does the majority of text on the packaging appear to be in?
Are there any visible seals or tamper-evident features on the packaging?
What is the overall style of the packaging design; simple or elaborate?
Does the packaging exhibit any noticeable gloss or shine?
Ignoring text, are there any distinct graphic elements beyond the color?
